name: Earl Bobby is looking for a Loo
name_original: Earl Bobby is looking for a Loo
description:
This is the third and last part of the Earl Bobby trilogy. Be sure to play the two other free Earl Bobby games first, so it might be more fun!

This is the first Earl Bobby game with HD resolution and true color depth! Fully voiced in German, English and even Italian.

Earl Bobby is back. This time he is looking for a Loo.
